program_description: A 12-week hypertrophy program split into two blocks with a deload in the middle. Block 2 introduces advanced intensity techniques.

exercises.notes: Set machine for max stretch. Prevent butt from popping up.
30 degree incline. Lift in Y shape.
Lean back 15 degrees. Drive elbows down.
Seat back far. Pull butt down into seat.
Lower feet for quad focus. No back rounding.
